root.para: When a time lag in reporting between the date of the financial statements of the investor and that of the investee exists, the requirement in paragraph .38 of AU-C section 600B for the group engagement team to evaluate whether appropriate adjustments have been made to the financial statements is applicable. The effect of the time lag may be material (for example, because the time lag is not consistent with the prior period in comparative statements or because a significant transaction occurred during the time lag). If a change in time lag occurs that has a material effect on the investorâ€™s financial statements, the auditor should consider the consistency of the financial statements for the periods presented, in accordance with AU-C section 708B, , because of the change in reporting period.
